name: Escape the Labyrinth (itch)
description:
A casual game where your only goal is to reach the end of the labyrinth. Easy... right?! The end of the labyrinth may not be on the other side of the maze, but may be hidden somewhere in the middle!

Notice: This game is still in active development, and will receive updates introducing new levels weekly, if not every few days. Thank you for your continued patience in waiting for the official release, which should consist of about 20 levels if all goes well.
